dan-hesho.name: Dan Hesho
dan-hesho.location: In the fields northeast of Zora’s Domain.

zuna-kai.name: Zuna Kai
zuna-kai.location: Northern Akkala, northwest portion of Deep Akkala at Skull Lake.

bosh-kala.name: Bosh Kala
bosh-kala.location: South side of the Hylia River, due east of the Great Plateau Tower.

dah-kaso.name: Dah Kaso
dah-kaso.location: Below the Digdogg Suspension Bridge, northwest of Keh Namut shrine and Great Plateau.

hila-rao.name: Hila Rao
hila-rao.location: West of Kakariko Village where the river forks.

ja-baij.name: Ja Baij
ja-baij.location: Great Plateau in the Eastern Abbey.

kaam-ya-tak.name: Kaam Ya'tak
kaam-ya-tak.location: Southwest side of Central Hyrule in the hills southwest of Central Tower.

keh-namut.name: Keh Namut
keh-namut.location: Great Plateau, northwest of Mount Hylia.

oman-au.name: Oman Au
oman-au.location: Great Plateau, west of the Forest of Time.

owa-daim.name: Owa Daim
owa-daim.location: Great Plateau, east of Mount Hylia.

wahgo-katta.name: Wahgo Katta
wahgo-katta.location: Riverside Stable, northeast from the Forest of Time.

daqa-koh.name: Daqa Koh
daqa-koh.location: East of the Goron Hot Springs, southeast of Goron City.

gorae-torr.name: Gorae Torr
gorae-torr.location: Just north of Death Mountain and due west of Zuna Kai shrine.

qua-raym.name: Qua Raym
qua-raym.location: Eldin Canyon, west of Eldin Tower in the middle of a lava pool.

sah-dahaj.name: Sah Dahaj
sah-dahaj.location: West of Akkala Tower, due north of Foothill Stable and Mo'a Keet shrine.

shae-mosah.name: Shae Mo'sah
shae-mosah.location: Northwest of Goron City, just follow the northern path out of the city.

shora-hah.name: Shora Hah
shora-hah.location: Isle of Rabac, north of the Abandoned North Mine near Goron City.

tah-muhl.name: Tah Muhl
tah-muhl.location: Due north of Lanayru Tower and southwest of Foothill Stable and Mo'a Keet shrine.

ze-kasho.name: Ze Kasho
ze-kasho.location: Just west of the South Akkala Stable, northwest of the Akkala Tower.

ya-naga.name: Ya Naga
ya-naga.location: Center of Lake Hylia to the far south  of Central Hyrule on the map.

dagah-keek.name: Dagah Keek
dagah-keek.location: Veiled Falls, southwest of Zora's Domain.

daka-tuss.name: Daka Tuss
daka-tuss.location: South side of the Lanayru Wetlands.

rucco-maag-shrine.name: Rucco Maag Shrine
rucco-maag-shrine.location: Due south of Zora’s Domain and west of the Lanayru Great Spring.

sheh-rata.name: Sheh Rata
sheh-rata.location: Northwest of the Lanayru Wetlands in the middle of the water.

soh-kofi.name: Soh Kofi
soh-kofi.location: Northeast of the Lanayru Wetlands and due north of the Lanayru Tower.

taloh-naeg.name: Ta'loh Naeg
taloh-naeg.location: In the cliffs just north of Kakariko Village.

tahno-oah.name: Tahno O'ah
tahno-oah.location: Hidden in the snowy cliffs on the far east side of Madorna Mountain, northeast of Hateno Ancient Tech Lab.

chaas-qeta.name: Chaas Qeta
chaas-qeta.location: Due south of Hateno Village and northeast of Muwo Jeem shrine on a small island.

ha-dahamar.name: Ha Dahamar
ha-dahamar.location: West of Dueling Peaks Stable and east of the Dueling Peaks.

korgu-chideh.name: Korgu Chideh
korgu-chideh.location: Island far southeast of Hateno Village. Use the raft from the Chaas Qeta shrine to get there.

muwo-jeem.name: Muwo Jeem
muwo-jeem.location: Due south of Hateno Village on the edge of a cliff.

ree-dahee.name: Ree Dahee
ree-dahee.location: North Dueling Peaks, on the high path near the west side of the Dueling Peaks passage.

toto-sah.name: Toto Sah
toto-sah.location: Southeast of Dueling Peaks Stable, across the river west of Hickaly Woods, hidden in the cliff.

noya-neha.name: Noya Neha
noya-neha.location: West of Hyrule Castle in the cliffside east of the Regencia River.

maag-norah.name: Maag No'rah
maag-norah.location: Hidden in the mountains on the north side of the Ridgeland region, west of the Monya Toma shrine.

mogg-latan.name: Mogg Latan
mogg-latan.location: In the Satori Mountains, south of Hyrule Ridge and the Ridgeland Tower.

shae-loya.name: Shae Loya
shae-loya.location: Southwest of Ridgeland Tower, due south from Tabantha Bridge Stable.

toh-yahsa.name: Toh Yahsa
toh-yahsa.location: Hidden in the Thundra Plateau just west of Ridgeland Tower and Hyrule Castle.

zalta-wa.name: Zalta Wa
zalta-wa.location: Southeast of Ridgeland Tower and west of Hyrule Castle.

akh-vaquot.name: Akh Va'quot
akh-vaquot.location: Rito Village, north of Tabantha Tower.

tena-kosah.name: Tena Ko'sah
tena-kosah.location: Head west across the Tabantha Great Bridge, then look in the mountains to the south.

dako-tah.name: Dako Tah
dako-tah.location: In the mountains just north of Kara Kara Bazaar.

kay-noh.name: Kay Noh
kay-noh.location: East of Wasteland Tower and just south of Gerudo Canyon Stable.

daag-chokah.name: Daag Chokah
daag-chokah.location: Northwest corner of the Great Hyrule Forest.

keo-ruug.name: Keo Ruug
keo-ruug.location: Korok Forest in the Lost Woods, to the right of the Master Sword.

kuhn-sidajj.name: Kuhn Sidajj
kuhn-sidajj.location: Southwest corner of the Great Hyrule Forest, northwest side of Lake Saria.

maag-halan.name: Maag Halan
maag-halan.location: Northeast corner of the Great Hyrule Forest, north side of the Mido Swamp.

monya-toma.name: Monya Toma
monya-toma.location: Southwest corner of the Woodland region, just south of the Serenne Stable.

ritaag-zumo.name: Ritaag Zumo
ritaag-zumo.location: Center of the Rist Peninsula which is located east of the Akkala Highlands.

tu-kaloh.name: Tu Ka'loh
tu-kaloh.location: Far northeast corner of the Akkala Tower Region on an isolated island.

tutsuwa-nima.name: Tutsuwa Nima
tutsuwa-nima.location: Behind the Spring of Power, east of East Akkala Stable.

kayra-mah.name: Kayra Mah
kayra-mah.location: Just southwest of the Gorko Lake within the Gorko Tunnel.

shae-katha.name: Shae Katha
shae-katha.location: East from Lake Tower along the road through Faron Forest.

misae-suma.name: Misae Suma
misae-suma.location: Far southeast corner of the Gerudo Desert.

kema-zoos.name: Kema Zoos
kema-zoos.location: Northwest of Gerudo Town in a sandstorm.

dila-maag.name: Dila Maag
dila-maag.location: East of Gerudo, west of Mount Granajh, inside the South Lomei Labyrinth.

korsh-ohu.name: Korsh O'hu
korsh-ohu.location: In the middle of some ruins just southwest of the Wastleland Tower.

suma-sahma.name: Suma Sahma
suma-sahma.location: Between Mount Granajh and Daval Peak.

tawa-jinn.name: Tawa Jinn
tawa-jinn.location: Just above the Taran Pass to the West.

lakna-rokee.name: Lakna Rokee
lakna-rokee.location: Hidden in the forest with the fairy fountain directly east of Kakariko Village.

shoqa-tatone.name: Shoqa Tatone
shoqa-tatone.location: On the western end of Puffer Beach in the Lake Tower region.

qukah-nata.name: Qukah Nata
qukah-nata.location: On a hill just south of Calora Lake.

mozo-shenno.name: Mozo Shenno
mozo-shenno.location: Northwestern area of the Hebra Region, in a small cave on the eastern cliffside of Biron Snowshelf.

voo-lota.name: Voo Lota
voo-lota.location: West of Rito Village, across the gorge near Passer Hill.

qaza-tokki.name: Qaza Tokki
qaza-tokki.location: Northeast of the North Tabantha Snowfield.

jitan-sami.name: Jitan Sa'mi
jitan-sami.location: On the summit of Mount Lanayru

mezza-lo.name: Mezza Lo
mezza-lo.location: Rabia Plain, which is Northeast of Kakariko Village in the Hateno Region.

shai-yota.name: Shai Yota
shai-yota.location: Horon Lagoon, north of Lanayru Bay, nestled between Brynna Plain and Talus Plateau.

sheem-dagoze.name: Sheem Dagoze
sheem-dagoze.location: South of Ridgeland Tower, just north of the bridge connecting West Hyrule Plains to Nima Plain.

keeha-yoog.name: Keeha Yoog
keeha-yoog.location: Gerudo Highlands to the East of Gerudo Summit.
